review: Dr. Ginni is more of a family member to us. We started consulting doctor approx 9-10 months back. She was well supportive during entire pregnancy of my wife. She is really knowledgeable and identified the cause of any problem before the Lab reports came. Only because of her extended support, my wife was detected with an un-usual infection, which all other Support Operation Doctors were rejecting, and she called special Surgeon from other hospital to treat it (I was in the OT at that time). She treats patients like her responsibility and go way beyond than expectations. I think it was the best-est decision of our life, that we chose Dr Ginni as Gynae for my wife. She never thought of time, Holidays, Her Own family and even she shown availability during a Death at home. What more we can expect for a Doctor. She is gem of a heart, polite and really nice human being. She's is the one never got irritated with our unwanted queries, questions and calls. She is now more of a Elder Sister to me and I will strongly recommend Dr Ginni to everyone, who needs a helping hand.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am blessed with a baby boy few days back. The way Dr. Gini Sharma handled my entire pregnancy and delivery was commendable. My entire pregnancy was roller coaster, however kudos to doctor for always being available on call and giving me best guidance / solution for each issues faced in my entire pregnancy. She definitely has a personal touch with her patients. She was always positive in her approach and helped me steer through my pregnancy in a most convenient manner. I would really recommend everyone to refer to her.

I am visiting doctor Ginni sharma even before my pregnancy for UTI treatment. Then I got pregnant and I started my prenatal visits with her. *** ** **** ** ******* ****** * **** **** **** My due date is in October end and I am unaware about the experience with her about the last stage of my pregnancy of labor and delivery. But I am 110% sure that I am going to get the best treatment from her. I always afraid of having c section and preferred normal delivery and I am quiet sure that I would get normal delivery as the doctor always prefer and support it and give me  the tips to have normal delivery. I searched a lot for good gyne but I must say that no once can be better than dr Ginni sharma. I would definitely going to give my feedback after having my delivery after 31st October. *** ***** *** **** ********** I would higly recommend her. Thank you

Dr. Ginni Sharma was like a saviour for me. She brought out my child to this world with the best ease anyone could give. Throughout my pregnancy I never worried even for a single minute as she was there by my side 24/7 and fr every single thing I used to look upto her. "I owe a lot to you mam, you gave me another life". I have never seen such a down to earth doc and such a genuine lady ever. God bless.

A life saver is Dr. Ginni. I just simply recommend each pregnant women to visit this doctor once in the beginning. I am sure everyone will visit her again and again. She used to tell me about each and every minor and major things in advance. I have troubled her a lot during my pregnancy (even late nights). She is a lovely lady by nature. A very down to earth woman. I and my husband Respect her a lot. Thank you for everything.

she is one of the most heartwarming and professional doctor I have ever seen who actually empathise with her patients and pregnancy being one of the most important phase of a woman's life..Very body needs a doctor like Ginni Mam only who become a life coach and guard for her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Most professional and genuine advise given and treatment prescribed to us , very humble and experienced doctor, a must visit for those who want genuine advice and treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ****** ****** *** very caring. She listen the issue very patiently and recommend the **** treatment for curing the disease.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Ginni is what an ideal Doctor should be. I am pregnant and she has been my single point of contact for treatment of symptoms during pregnancy. She has got a plethora of home remedies and will resort to medicines only when actually required. She attends all her patients calls and if possible advises them over phone, saving them the hassle and time to come and visit avoiding Delhi's traffic. I consider myself lucky to have found her for my Pregnancy period.
